data.trans_hint: Cô ấy mở nhạc để động viên người bạn trai của mình.
data.en_hint: She plays music to cheer up her boyfriend.
data.content_game_1: She plays music to cheer up her boyfriend.
data.answer_en_hint: She plays music to cheer up her boyfriend.

data.trans: Chờ, đợi hay ngừng làm gì
data.trans_hint: Bây giờ chờ một chút, bạn thực sự không thể biết mình vừa nói gì đâu!
data.en_hint: Now hang on a minute, you can't really know what you just said!
data.content_game_1: Now hang on a minute, you can't really know what you just said!
data.answer_en_hint: Now hang on a minute, you can't really know what you just said!

data.trans_hint: Coi chừng! Có một xe buýt tới.
data.en_hint: Look out! There's a bus coming.
data.content_game_1: Look out! There's a bus coming.
data.answer_en_hint: Look out! There's a bus coming.

data.trans_hint: Tránh ra — bạn đang ở ngáng đường đó!
data.en_hint: Mind out—you're in the way there!
data.content_game_1: Mind out—you're in the way there!
data.answer_en_hint: Mind out—you're in the way there!

data.trans_hint: Anh ta yêu cầu chúng tôi cút đi chỗ khác và để anh ấy một mình.
data.en_hint: He told them to push off and leave him alone.
data.content_game_1: He told them to push off and leave him alone.
data.answer_en_hint: He told them to push off and leave him alone.

data.trans: Đề phòng, để ý, coi chừng
data.trans_hint: Hãy coi chừng những chiếc xe khi bạn băng qua đường.
data.en_hint: Watch out for cars when you cross the road.
data.content_game_1: watch out for cars when you cross the road.
data.answer_en_hint: watch out for cars when you cross the road.

data.trans_hint: Trước sự khó chịu của cô, kẻ lạ mặt vẫn không chịu rời đi.
data.en_hint: To her annoyance, the stranger did not go away.
data.content_game_1: To her annoyance, the stranger did not go away.
data.answer_en_hint: To her annoyance, the stranger did not go away.

data.trans_hint: Thôi đi! Đừng nói dối ngay trước mặt tôi như thế.
data.en_hint: Come off it! Don't lie to me on my face.
data.content_game_1: Come off it! Don't lie to me on my face.
data.answer_en_hint: Come off it! Don't lie to me on my face.

data.trans: Mặc kệ tôi, bỏ tôi ra
data.trans_hint: Mặc kệ tôi! Tôi muốn một mình.
data.en_hint: Get off me! I want to be alone.
data.content_game_1: Get off me! I want to be alone.
data.answer_en_hint: Get off me! I want to be alone.

data.trans_hint: Làm nhanh lên nào! Chúng ta đang bị muộn đó.
data.en_hint: Get on with it! We are late.
data.content_game_1: Get on with it! We are late.
data.answer_en_hint: Get on with it! We are late.

data.trans_hint: Anh đừng trẻ con như thế chứ? Anh ta chỉ là bạn thôi.
data.en_hint: Would you grow up? - He is just a friend.
data.content_game_1: Would you grow up? - He is just a friend.
data.answer_en_hint: Would you grow up? - He is just a friend.

data.trans_hint: Làm ơn để tôi yên - Tôi không muốn nói chuyện bây giờ.
data.en_hint: Please leave me alone - I don't want to talk now.
data.content_game_1: Please leave me alone - I don't want to talk now.
data.answer_en_hint: Please leave me alone - I don't want to talk now.

data.trans_hint: Chẳng ai có thể khiến tôi rời khỏi nhà của tôi cả, vì thế đừng động vào tôi!
data.en_hint: No one can make me leave my house, so take your hands off me.
data.content_game_1: No one can make me leave my house, so take your hands off me.
data.answer_en_hint: No one can make me leave my house, so take your hands off me.
